description:
Ranran finishes her analysis of the UN`s invisibility suit and sends her findings to Kato. Saruta begins his attack on the school and starts cutting down the students and faculty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Gonna Go Down in Shinobi History
Je resterai dans l`histoire des ninjas
Ore wa Shinobi no Rekishi ni Nokoruze
俺は忍びの歴史に残るぜ
